'''1.8.1-pre5''' is the fifth and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.8.1]], released on November 19, 2014, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20141125025857/https://mojang.com/2014/10/minecraft-1-8-1-pre-release-1/|title=Minecraft 1.8.1 Pre-release 5|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.8.1-pre5|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|61640|Snow layers can't be placed on top of another full snow layer block.
|64653|{{cmd|execute}} particle leaves a false particle trail to 0,0,0.
|71436|Screen goes black when "highlighting" players in spectator mode.
|;From 1.8
|58132|Spectator mode layer glitch.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This version was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
